name: ecom-unified-project
description: Unified E-commerce project with Frontend and Backend CMS

scripts.install:all: cd "Backend" && npm install && cd ../Frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "FRONTEND,RAZORPAY,CMS,API" -c "blue,cyan,magenta,green" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:razorpay-server" "npm run dev:cms" "npm run dev:api"
scripts.dev:simple: concurrently --names "FRONTEND,CMS,API" -c "blue,magenta,green" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:cms" "npm run dev:api"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:cms
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:servers
scripts.build:servers: cd Frontend && npm run build:server && cd ../"Backend" && npm run build:server
